system.description:
At 15th level, you gain access to powerful sealing magicks. You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.j6k8ct3ih2drnfqg]{Forbiddance}, guards & wards, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.w431uss5pcnropb4]{Symbol} spells once (each) per long rest. In addition, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ab4ea4v5j547diyf]{Private Sanctum} is added to the herald list for you.

Finally, you always have the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zc250942nlox9vyk]{Counterspell}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.hms9kdl2qoqjjrs4]{Dispel Magic}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.l16wg9h1z9s16exb]{Remove Curse} spells prepared (they do not count against your limit of prepared spells).
